thobe.logfileviewer.plugin.api

Interface IPluginBase

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IPlugin, IPluginUI

    public interface IPluginBase
    Author:
    Thomas Obenaus

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBugfixVersion()
      Returns the bugfix version of this IPlugin.
      int getMajorVersion()
      Returns the major version of this IPlugin.
      int getMinorVersion()
      Returns the minor version of this IPlugin.
      IPluginApiVersion getPluginApiVersion()
      Should return the version of the plugin-api that was used for this IPlugin.
      java.lang.String getPluginAuthor()
      Should return the author of this plugin or null if none is available.
      java.lang.String getPluginAuthorEMailAddress()
      Should return the email address of the plugins author or null if none is available.
      java.lang.String getPluginDescription()
      This method should return a short description of this IPlugin
      java.lang.String getPluginLicense()
      Should return the license that applies to this plugin or null if none is available.
      java.lang.String getPluginName()
      This method should return the name of this IPlugin.
      java.lang.String getPluginVersion()
      Returns the version of this IPluginBase.
      java.lang.String getPluginWebsite()
      Should return the website where the plugin is hosted at or null if none is available.

                       throws PluginException
